name: impishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that takes pleasure in causing trouble, but may be funny and attractive : She grinned impishly at the camera. "Well, I’m not sure," he replied impishly. See
impish
More examplesFewer examplesAfter a minute he impishly raised his hand.A big wave finally crashes down on our friend even as she impishly sticks out her tongue.At times, he can be impishly charming.
